question: The 93rd Constitutional Amendment Bill deals with which of the following provisions?
option1: Continuation of reservation for backward classes in government employment
option2: free and compulsory education for all children between the age of 6 and 14 years
option3: reservation of 30 per cent posts for women in government recruitments
option4: allocation of more number of parliamentary seats for recently created States
answer: free and compulsory education for all children between the age of 6 and 14 years
explanation: According to 93rd Amendment every Child of the age group of 6-14 years shall have right to free and compulsory Education. No child is liable to pay any kind of fee/ capitation fee/ charges. A collection of capitation fee invites a fine up to 10 times the amount collected.
